attributes.action: ban all these daft online petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
These online petitions take up busy procrastinators' time. Time that will never come again. Time that could be better spent on useful sites like Mumsnet. I call on the PM to ban them all.
Including this one!!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
